description: An entertainment web app built with Next.js and TailwindCSS that allows users to search for movies and tv shows as well as viewing relevant information.
title: Entertainment

description: A dark/light themed React web app built together with Styled Components and Recoil that allows users to add, mark, and delete to-do items. The users can drag and drop to reorder the to-do items.
title: Todo

description: A simple web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The user can press on the button to generate a random advice every two seconds.
title: Advice

description: A beautiful product landing page built with HTML and SCSS along with modern CSS practices.
title: Typemaster
